title: W.C Fields/the Dentist-the Fatal Glass of Beer-the Golf Spec
brief_description: Three classic rare shorts from the great misanthrope child and dog hater and alcohol lover. The Dentist, 1932. The Fatal Glass of Beer, 1933. The Golf Specialist, 1930.
